name: Colorful Fairy Doors
description: The fairy village of Cypress Knee is famous for its bright colored doors. Little Folk travel far and wide to take photos near their favorites.
suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: The fairy village of Cypress Knee is famous for its bright colored doors. Little Folk travel far and wide to take photos near their favorites. These thumb-sized fairy doors are a super, quick knit. They are knit in the round on dpns. Because they have a front and a back they don’t need blocking. Their wooden frames and brass door knobs are done with simple embroidery. I have decided to make these free. Please make as many as you like and feel free to make them to sell :) Happy Knitting! Natasha Praise for Colorful Fairy Doors Fun!! Very quick and easy project! ( MinniStitcher ) Super Quick Well written w/ links to embroidery tutorials. ( RandyRatCraft ) Quick knit. ( bonewoman ) A very quick, cute little knit. (Bogwoppit) This is a very quick fun project. (Omissi) I’m glad to have a door anywhere! Especially in spring, I feel like there are fairies everywhere. Even I completed it in less than 30 minutes. It could have been earlier. (mirihi) Such a tiny little door! Made for fairies, only.( Saphiera) A wonderful pattern that is very quick to knit and leaves room for your own embellishments. (kleinesundfeines)
